presentation: Hello! My name is Samuel Rojas.
description: I'm a web and mobile developer that build responsive websites and development cross-platform Apps.
msgContact: Feel free to contact me on
submsgContact: Or you can send me an email from here!

knowlegde.firstDsc: I’m very familiar using web tecnhologies like HTML5, CCS3, TypeScript and JavaScript under the ECMAScript standard from version 6 to version 12.
knowlegde.secondDsc: I have worked on the Front-end with frameworks such as Angular and React with their libraries such as Material UI and Angular Material. Also, functional libraries such as axios for handling requests and react-hook-form for validations at the frontend. I have experience creating responsive web pages with high performance.
knowlegde.thirdDsc: Otherwise, I’m familiar using the framework React Native for building across-platform Apps with libraries such as react-native-paper. and Also, Electron in the case of cross-platform desktop applications.
knowlegde.quarterDsc: However, In the back-end I have used PHP, Java and NodeJs with ExpressJs for the creation of REST API, using both SQL and NoSQL databases. Such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Realm and Firebase.
knowlegde.fiftDsc: Additionally, I have worked under SCRUM and Kanban methodologies with tools such as Trello, Jira, Slack and Confluence. Also, I have knowledge of visual tools like Figma, Zeplin, MarvelApp and Mockflow.

about.resume:
I'm a Venezuelan web designer and a mobile developer.
I really like to create useful and intuitive products with comfortable visual interfaces for everybody.
